title: 114_hr3571
content: Fuel Cell Tax Extenders Act of 2015 This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2021: the residential energy efficient property tax credit for qualified fuel cell property, the energy tax credit for qualified fuel cell property, the alternative motor vehicle tax credit for qualified fuel cell motor vehicles, the tax credit for alternative fuel vehicle refueling property relating to hydrogen, and the excise tax credit for the sale or use of alternative fuels involving hydrogen.
